Introduction
============

Features
--------

- Fetch protein profile from databases automatically
- Run Pfamscan online for protein domain prediction
- Human-readable dataframe for data inspect

Github
----------

- Link: https://github.com/Phillip404/easy_protein_tree_annotating

Support
-------

If you are having issues, please let us know.
We have a mailing list located at: xu2742zh-s@student.lu.se

License
-------

The project is licensed under the GNUn 3.0 license.
